name: Brickz! (DEMO) ZX Spectrum Next
description:
Brickz! is a "Breakout" style game created as a companion for the Spriteworx YouTube video #45 demonstrating a game development workflow for creating a game from start to finish.  This quick-and-dirty playable DEMO is written in un-optimized BASIC so it may not be the smoothest in terms of gameplay but it contains 7 complete levels featuring screens from the upcoming full version themed level packs as well as some cool feature such as bombs and explosive bricks. It is playable with keyboard or joystick and if you get a high score the game will save itself automatically.
